entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
